title: Embroidered Panel, 19th–20th century
medium:
Medium: cotton, metallic thread
Technique: embroidered on plain weave
description: Cotton panel with alternating stripes of varying widths in orange, red, and black. At one end heavily embroidered in metallic thread and small "tumpal" motif (row of isosceles triangles) at border. Showing stylized animal and floral motifs.

tombstone.epitaph:
Embroidered Panel, 19th–20th century.
19th–20th century. Medium: cotton, metallic thread
Technique: embroidered on plain weave. Gift of Mrs. Calvin Stillman. 1965-24-4.
